title: Api
description: Marker type for generating API json schema types for ts

BtnChord.description: A button chord. At least 2 buttons are required.

phantom.description: Phantom exists to prevent struct instantiation without passing through the `new` function for validation

ConfigSelection.description: Configured selection for an specific pipeline. Only user values are saved; everything else is pulled at runtime to ensure it's up to date.

settings_path.description: command to run the emulator user defined custom path

valid_ext.description: valid file extensions for settings file

enable_ui_inject.description: If true, inject buttons onto app action bar

log_level.description: Overwrite the desktop layout with the game layout

next_window_hooks.description: Button chord to be used to exit profiles that register for exit hooks. Button chord to be used to exit profiles that register for exit hooks.

primary_ui_target.description: If `enable_ui_inject` is true, set the "Play" button to this target

use_nonsteam_desktop_controller_layout_h.description: Overwrite the desktop layout with the game layout

MelonDSLayoutOption.description: melonDS layout options. Because of the "unique" way melonDS handles layouts (and how much I viscerally hate them), these options do not map 1:1.

cemu.description: Some(options) if Cemu is configurable, None otherwise

citra.description: Some(options) if Citra is configurable, None otherwise

dolphin.description: Some(options) if Dolphin is configurable, None otherwise

enabled.description: Flags whether the selection is enabled. If None, not optional. If Some(true), optional and enabled, else disabled.

is_visible_on_qam.description: Whether or not the pipeline action is hidden on the QAM

profile_override.description: Flags whether the selection is overridden by the setting from a different profile.

selection.description: The value of the pipeline action

enabled.description: Flags whether the selection is enabled. If None, not optional. If Some(true), optional and enabled, else disabled.

is_visible_on_qam.description: Whether or not the pipeline action is hidden on the QAM

profile_override.description: Flags whether the selection is overridden by the setting from a different profile.

selection.description: The value of the pipeline action

oneOf.description: Selects one of the available actions
Selects all of the available actions
Like AllOf, but when rendered in the UI, don't display a header for the entries

TopLevelDefinition.description: Defines a top-level action, with a root id and a unique set of actions. This allows multiple top-level actions of the same type, without complicating the structure too much.
